name: vscode-ext-serve-run-wasm
displayName: Experimental - run wasm on the terminal
description: serve the ability to run wasm on the terminal
author: hankei6km <hankei6km@gmail.com> (https://github.com/hankei6km)

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build && bash scripts/gen-changelog.sh
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:electron
scripts.pretest: rimraf tmp && mkdir -p tmp/test_out && rimraf wasm/bin && mkdir wasm/bin && if test "${GITHUB_ACTIONS}" = true; then cp wasm/target/wasm32-wasi/debug/chk1.wasm wasm/bin/chk1.wasm; fi
scripts.test:unit: mocha --require ts-node/register --require source-map-support/register --watch-extensions ts --ui tdd src/extension/test/unit/**/*.test.ts
scripts.pretest:electron: node esbuild.test-electron.config.mjs && if test "${GITHUB_ACTIONS}" != true; then cargo build --release && cargo build --manifest-path wasm/Cargo.toml --target wasm32-wasi && cp wasm/target/wasm32-wasi/debug/chk1.wasm wasm/bin/chk1.wasm; fi
